## Installation

You can install the development version of LogSeqR like so:

``` r
if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("devtools")

devtools::install_github("andjar/LogSeqR", ref = "main")
```

## Example

This is a very basic example that converts a json exported from LogSeq to a json that an be imported to TiddlyWiki:

```{r example}
library(LogSeqR)

k <- import_from_json("test.json")
k <- process_raw_blocks(k)
export_to_json(k)
```
